snippet: The killing of a woman accused of sorcery is part of a pattern of vigilante attacks in the country, the United Nations human rights office said on Friday.
lead_paragraph: The killing of a woman accused of sorcery is part of a pattern of vigilante attacks in the country, the United Nations human rights office said on Friday.

headline.main: U.N. Calls on Papua New Guinea to Curb Violence After Burning Death of Woman
headline.print_headline: U.N. Calls on Papua New Guinea to Curb Violence After Burning Death of Woman

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject
